price: ߊ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߒ ߡߌ߬ߙߌ߲߬ߘߌ ߒߠߋ ߦߴߊߟߎ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߖߊ߬ߛߙߋ߬ߡߊ߬ߟߌ߬ߟߊ߬ ߘߐ߬ߜߍ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߘߋ߬
arabic: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّي لَكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāqawmi innī lakum nadhīrun mubīnun
